results.title: Cabiria
results.brief_description: Cabiria is a 1914 Italian epic silent film, directed by Giovanni Pastrone that laid the foundation for the Hollywood epics that followed. Featuring groundbreaking special effects used to show a volcanic eruption, the film is also famous for inventing the tracking shot.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.description: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage. Just as she’s to be sacrificed to Moloch, Cabiria is rescued by Fulvius Axilla, a good-hearted Roman spy, and his powerful slave, Maciste. The trio are broken up and Cabiria is entrusted to woman of noble birth. With Maciste punished for his heroism, Fulvius sent away to fight for Rome, and Cabiria’s fate unknown, is there any hope of our heroes reuniting?
description_for_label: Young Cabiria is kidnapped by pirates and sold as a slave in Carthage. results.title: Cabin fever
results.creator_credit: Eli Roth, Lauren Moews, Evan Astrowsky, Sam Froelich, Deer Path Films, Black Sky Entertainment and ICON
results.brief_description: Written, directed and produced by Eli Roth, “Cabin Fever” is about a group of five friends who happily set out for a holiday adventure in a cabin in the woods. All seems fine until one of them gets sick with a gross flesh-eating virus. So scary it’s funny, this gory film is written to graphically shock you as opposed to keeping you in suspense, it even comes with a director’s warning at the beginning! Cast includes Jordan Ladd, James DeBello, Rider Strong, Joey Kern and Cerina Vincent. WARNING: SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB.

results.title: Cabbie of the year
results.creator_credit: Mick Connolly, Scottie Connolly and Film Victoria
results.brief_description: Bobs luck changes when he mistakenly becomes a Taxi Driver of the Year finalist. As he performs his PR duties with unusual success, he starts to feel just a little impressive - impressive enough to make a move on Kaz, the base secretary hes been secretly admiring for two years. Unfortunately before he manages to ask her out, he is disqualified from the competition in well publicised disgrace. His impressiveness in tatters Bob must decide whether or not to go for Kaz anyway.

results.title: Cabbages and kings, or, the dancing princess
results.brief_description: Animated silhouette adaptation of the Grimm Brothers’ fairy tale. “King Thrushbeard” is a parable about the value of work, love responsibility and humility. Suitable for primary school level.

results.title: Cabbage root fly
results.creator_credit: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
results.brief_description: Shows the life cycle of this insect which has become a serious pest in Europe and America, the larvae attacking cruciferous plants such as the cabbage and cauliflower.

results.title: Cabaret
results.creator_credit: Bob Fosse, Cy Feuer, Allied Artists Pictures and ABC Pictures (US)
results.brief_description: One of the most acclaimed Broadway musicals of all time is brought to the screen with the aid of the brilliant and electrifying Liza Minnelli. For entertainment as its very best you can’t go past “Cabaret” - a scintillating musical with pure gold of human drama beneath its surface glitter. A one-of-a kind musical. Based on Christopher Isherwood’s Berlin stories.

results.title: Cabaret
results.brief_description: Inside the Kit Kat Club of 1931 Berlin, starry-eyed singer Sally Bowles and an impish emcee sound the clarion call to decadent fun, while outside a certain political party grows into a brutal force.
results.description: Inside the Kit Kat Club of 1931 Berlin, starry-eyed singer Sally Bowles and an impish emcee sound the clarion call to decadent fun, while outside a certain political party grows into a brutal force.

results.title: C.R.A.Z.Y.
results.brief_description: A story of two love affairs. A father’s love for his five sons. And one son’s love for his father, a love so strong it compels him to live a lie. That son is Zac Beaulieu, born on the 25th of December 1960, different from all his brothers, but desperate to fit in. During the next 20 years, life takes Zac on a surprising and unexpected journey that ultimately leads him to accept his true nature and, even more importantly, leads his father to love him for who he really is.

results.title: C.P.R. a lifesaving skill
results.creator_credit: Jonathan Cooper and Australian First Aid
results.brief_description: This instructional video produced by Australian First Aid shows us what to do in the event of an an unexpected cardiac arrest. The video demonstrates with eerie reality what happens in the absence of Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation (C.P.R.) knowledge and demonstrates the difference made to a life when C.P.R. is performed. Mouth to mouth and chest compression both help to supply a constant supply of oxygen to a patient. Without oxygen, the dies dies after 2-3 minutes. A scary thought, but necessary to understand when placed within an emergency where every minute is vital. Following the DRABC method, this video shows us how we can avert a fatal situation.
